nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: Oh, excuse me. You have a {quality_kind} {person_face}. Are you a {person_traveler}?

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: It means you look like a {quality_good} {person_person}. Not {quality_dangerous}. It's a nice compliment.

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: A {person_traveler} must be {quality_lonely} sometimes. Do you {action_have} a {person_family}? A {person_mother} or a {person_father}?

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: I am waiting for my {person_husband}. A {person_husband} is a very important part of a {person_family}. From your experience, who is usually older: a {person_child} or a {person_father}?

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: Oh, no, my dear. A {person_father} is the parent. The {person_child} is young. But I see you are {action_think}ing about it. That is what's important.

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: Yes, that's right. You have a clear understanding of {person_family}. It warms my heart to see such wisdom in a {person_traveler}.

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: You have a gentle soul. This {location_town} is not always so {quality_kind}. Please, {action_take} this {item_scarf}. It is soft and warm. A {action_welcome} {item_gift}.

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: I hope my {person_husband} arrives soon. Be safe on your travels.

nodes.speaker: Eleonora Vance
nodes.text: It is nice to see a friendly {person_face} again.
